The domain also has protective status codes against unauthorized transfers and deletions. This aligns with the practices of a legitimate, established company. Before finalizing my decision, I should check for any additional information or public opinion on the website.

As a matter of policy, BBB does not endorse any product, service or ...'}, {'url': 'https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.thermofisher.com', 'content': "Unaccountable. And don't expect their accounts people in Budapest to pay within a reasonable time. They can't be phoned and don't reply to emails. If and when you do hear from them, it's a chat-bot generated string of meaningless guff which they don't explain. Date of experience: December 20, 2022."}, {'url': 'https://jobs.thermofisher.com/global/en/job-scams', 'content': 'You can verify the hiring manager is an employee at the company by researching the hiring manager on LinkedIn. Not all employees are on LinkedIn, another way to verify is the email address matches an @thermofisher.com email. Hiring Managers will not use their personal emails to communicate with candidates. Who will be distributing my pay?'}]

thought: The search results include a fraud reporting form on Thermo Fisher Scientific's official corporate website, suggesting that they are aware of potential fraudulent activities and provide a means for reporting such incidents. This indicates that the company takes security and fraud seriously. Other results include third-party websites that analyze the legitimacy of websites, but these do not provide conclusive evidence of a scam. A complaint on BBB and a negative review on Trustpilot suggest some customer dissatisfaction but do not necessarily indicate a scam. Given the official nature of the domain, the absence of scam characteristics in the website text, and the presence of fraud reporting mechanisms, it appears that the website is legitimate. I now know the final answer. The URL https://www.thermofisher.com/jp/ja/home/brands/invitrogen/ambion.html is not a scam website.

There are no indications of scam characteristics such as unusually low prices free money claims or targeting of human psychological weaknesses.
